titleStmt.title: An account of the proceedings against Nathaniel Thomson, upon his tryal at the Kings Bench-Bar Westminster who was tryed, and found guilty on Wednesday the 26th of November 1684. for printing a dangerous and seditious libel, intitled the Prodigal return'd home, asserting the Popes supremacy in ecclesiastical affaires, &c.
titleStmt.author: Thompson, Nathaniel, d. 1687.

titleStmt.title: An account of the proceedings against Nathaniel Thomson, upon his tryal at the Kings Bench-Bar Westminster who was tryed, and found guilty on Wednesday the 26th of November 1684. for printing a dangerous and seditious libel, intitled the Prodigal return'd home, asserting the Popes supremacy in ecclesiastical affaires, &c.
titleStmt.author: Thompson, Nathaniel, d. 1687.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

notesStmt.note: "The prodigal return'd home" is attributed to E. Lydeott.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
